doc:
Clyde Beatty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clyde_Beatty 0 Clyde Beatty (June 10, 1903 – July 19, 1965) joined the circus as a cage cleaner as a teen and became famous as a lion tamer and animal trainer. He also became a circus impresario who owned his own show, which later merged with the Cole Bros. Circus to form the Clyde Beatty–Cole Bros. Circus. Clyde_Beatty ( June_10_,_1903 – July_19_,_1965 ) joined the_circus as a_cage cleaner as a_teen and became famous as a_lion tamer and animal_trainer . He also became a_circus_impresario who owned his_own_show , which later merged with the_Cole_Bros . Circus to_form the_Clyde_Beatty – Cole_Bros . Circus .
